titleStmt.title: Innocency cleared, or, The case and vindication of Col. George Gill wherein is made apparent how the sentence of Parliament was procured against him and by what meanes the re-hearing hath been delayed : humbly presented to the Parliament with desires of speedy justice.
titleStmt.author: Gill, George.
